Package org.example.controller

Class UsersController

java.lang.Object
org.example.controller.UsersController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/users") @EnableWebFlux @CrossOrigin(origins="*", methods={GET,POST,PUT,DELETE}) public class UsersController extends Object
Controller class for handling user-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • userResponses

      @GetMapping public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<UserResponse> userResponses(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String auth)
      Retrieves all users.
      Parameters:
      auth - the Authorization header containing the JWT token
      Returns:
      Flux emitting UserResponse for each user

    • findById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<UserResponse> findById(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String auth)
      Finds a user by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to find
      auth - the Authorization header containing the JWT token
      Returns:
      Mono emitting UserResponse for the found user

    • update

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<UserResponse> update(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String auth, @RequestBody UserRequest userRequest)
      Updates a user by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to update
      auth - the Authorization header containing the JWT token
      userRequest - the updated user information
      Returns:
      Mono emitting UserResponse for the updated user

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> delete(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String auth)
      Deletes a user by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to delete
      auth - the Authorization header containing the JWT token
      Returns:
      Mono emitting Void upon successful deletion
